title: Businesswoman shot dead in Penang
text:
More 
A businesswoman was shot dead by one of two men on a motorcycle at Jalan Lintang Pekaka 9, Glugor, Penang, yesterday. 
Penang CID chief SAC Zainol Samah said 10 shots were fired at the woman at 5.45pm as she was driving alone from Sungai Dua to Bukit Gambir. 
"Six of the shots hit the victim's chest causing serious injuries," Zainol said. 
"The woman lost control of her vehicle which crashed into the rear of a four-wheel drive vehicle and rammed the wall of a house at Jalan Lintang Pekaka," he told reporters at the scene last night. 
The body was sent to the Penang Hospital, Zainol said, adding that police were relying on CCTV camera footage to track down the two suspects. 
- Bernama
